history_of_present_illness: 52M with sudden central chest pressure for 30 minutes radiating to left arm with sweating and nausea. Smoker. No prior MI.

soap_reference.subjective: Chest pressure radiating to left arm with diaphoresis and nausea.
soap_reference.assessment: High suspicion for acute coronary syndrome.
soap_reference.plan: Immediate ED evaluation ECG troponins aspirin if no contraindication monitor.
